name: A Robot's Dream
description:
Made in 3 hours for Trijam 78

If only Mr.Robot could start anew. Play as a robot in his dying dream where he fantasies life if only he took of as a singer. 

Press space on the beat or when the circle is green to hit the note if you miss you lose approval.

I kinda just made this because i had some leftover code of a simple beat timer from something i wanted to add to my game for Triple Trijam.  I polished it up and added a coat of paint to it and here it is. I still would have liked to use it to actually have the players need to press certain different keys on beat instead of just space. Also wanted to have the key you need to press change with the corresponding note.  Oh well maybe next time. 

Made all the art and music assets. except font https://www.1001freefonts.com/
